<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8" />
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
  <title>Have a Great Day</title>

  <!-- Playwrite-style handwritten font -->
  <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playwrite+US+Trad&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

  <style>
    body {
      margin: 0;
      height: 100vh;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background-color: #FFF2C6;
      overflow: hidden;
      font-family: 'Playwrite US Trad', cursive;
    }

    /* Floating hearts background */
    .heart {
      position: absolute;
      color: #ff9db5;
      font-size: 2.2rem;
      opacity: 0.9;
      animation: float 10s linear infinite;
    }

    @keyframes float {
      0% {
        transform: translateY(100vh) scale(0.9);
        opacity: 0;
      }
      20% { opacity: 0.9; }
      100% {
        transform: translateY(-10vh) scale(1.2);
        opacity: 0;
      }
    }
      

    .container {
      text-align: center;
      background: #FFF8DE;
      padding: 3rem 4rem;
      border-radius: 30px;
      box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
      position: relative;
      z-index: 2;
    }

    .line {
      width: 4px;
      height: 50px;
      background: #8CA9FF;
      margin: 0 auto 1rem auto;
      border-radius: 10px;
    }

    h1 {
      font-size: 2.5rem;
      color: #7a1f1f;
      min-height: 3rem;
      white-space: nowrap;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    button {
      margin-top: 2rem;
      padding: 0.7rem 1.6rem;
      font-size: 1rem;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 12px;
      background: #ff9db5;
      color: #7a1f1f;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-family: inherit;
      transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
    }

    button:hover {
      transform: translateY(-2px);
      box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>

  <!-- Hearts -->
  <div class="heart" style="left: 5%; animation-delay: 0s;">‚ô•</div>
  <div class="heart" style="left: 12%; animation-delay: 2s;">‚ô°</div>
  <div class="heart" style="left: 20%; animation-delay: 4s;">‚ô•</div>
  <div class="heart" style="left: 28%; animation-delay: 1s;">‚ô°</div>
  <div class="heart" style="left: 36%; animation-delay: 3s;">‚ô•</div>
  <div class="heart" style="left: 44%; animation-delay: 5s;">‚ô°</div>
  <div class="heart" style="left: 52%; animation-delay: 2s;">‚ô•</div>
  <div class="heart" style="left: 60%; animation-delay: 4s;">‚ô°</div>
  <div class="heart" style="left: 68%; animation-delay: 1s;">‚ô•</div>
  <div class="heart" style="left: 76%; animation-delay: 3s;">‚ô°</div>
  <div class="heart" style="left: 84%; animation-delay: 5s;">‚ô•</div>
  <div class="heart" style="left: 92%; animation-delay: 2s;">‚ô°</div>

  <div class="container">
    
    <h1 id="text"></h1>
    <button onclick="startTyping()">this is for you !</button>
  </div>

  <script>
    const message = "Have a great dayyy";
    let index = 0;
    let typingStarted = false;

    function startTyping() {
      if (typingStarted) return;
      typingStarted = true;
      index = 0;
      document.getElementById("text").textContent = "";
      typeWriter();
    }

    function typeWriter() {
      if (index < message.length) {
        document.getElementById("text").textContent += message.charAt(index);
        index++;
        setTimeout(typeWriter, 120);
      }
    }
  </script>

</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>Fairy Section</title>

  <style>
    * {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    html {
      scroll-behavior: smooth;
    }

    body {
      font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
      background: #fff4ec;
    }

    /* SECTION */
    .fairy-section {
      min-height: 100vh;
      padding: 6rem 2rem;
      text-align: center;
    }

    .fairy-title {
      font-size: 2.6rem;
      margin-bottom: 4rem;
      color: #7a1f1f;
      font-family: cursive;
    }

    /* GRID */
    .fairy-grid {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
      gap: 4rem;
      max-width: 1100px;
      margin: auto;
    }

    /* CARD */
    .fairy-card {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(70px) scale(0.95);
      transition: all 1.2s ease;
    }

    .fairy-card.show {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
    }

    /* IMAGE FRAME */
    .fairy-frame {
      position: relative;
      padding: 16px;
      border-radius: 26px;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd1e8, #ffe6b3);
      box-shadow: 0 0 45px rgba(255, 105, 180, 0.4);
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    /* FAIRY AURA */
    .fairy-frame::before {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      inset: -25px;
      background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,182,193,0.6), transparent 70%);
      animation: auraPulse 4s infinite alternate;
      z-index: 0;
    }

    @keyframes auraPulse {
      from { opacity: 0.4; }
      to { opacity: 0.9; }
    }

    .fairy-frame img {
      width: 100%;
      height: 300px; /* BIGGER IMAGE */
      object-fit: cover;
      border-radius: 18px;
      position: relative;
      z-index: 2;
    }

    /* PARTICLE LAYERS */
    .heart-layer,
    .sparkle-layer {
      position: absolute;
      inset: 0;
      pointer-events: none;
      z-index: 1;
    }

    /* TEXT */
    .fairy-text {
      margin-top: 1.2rem;
      font-size: 0.85rem;
      line-height: 1.4;
      color: #000;
    }

    /* ‚ù§Ô∏è HEARTS */
    .heart {
      position: absolute;
      bottom: -20px;
      animation: floatHeart 4s ease forwards;
      opacity: 0.9;
    }

    @keyframes floatHeart {
      0% {
        transform: translateY(0) scale(0.6);
        opacity: 1;
      }
      100% {
        transform: translateY(-180px) scale(1.5);
        opacity: 0;
      }
    }

    /* ‚ú® SPARKLES */
    .sparkle {
      position: absolute;
      width: 7px;
      height: 7px;
      border-radius: 50%;
      background: pink;
      box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(255,182,193,0.9);
      animation: sparkleFloat 5s linear forwards;
    }

    @keyframes sparkleFloat {
      from {
        transform: translateY(40px) scale(0.5);
        opacity: 1;
      }
      to {
        transform: translateY(-160px) scale(1.3);
        opacity: 0;
      }
    }

    /* üî• FAIRY FIRE */
    .fire {
      position: absolute;
      width: 12px;
      height: 12px;
      background: radial-gradient(circle, #ff9a9e, transparent);
      border-radius: 50%;
      animation: fireFly 3s ease-out forwards;
    }

    @keyframes fireFly {
      from {
        transform: translateY(30px) scale(0.3);
        opacity: 1;
      }
      to {
        transform: translateY(-120px) scale(1.5);
        opacity: 0;
      }
    }
  </style>
</head>

<body>

  <section class="fairy-section" id="fairy">
    <h2 class="fairy-title">Little moments for you üíó</h2>

    <div class="fairy-grid">

      <div class="fairy-card reveal">
        <div class="fairy-frame">
          <img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRXaFp4t03rNkv1HRS1sxApf_-dirzMuSUM1Q&s" alt="memory">
          <div class="heart-layer"></div>
        </div>
        <p class="fairy-text">
          abcdfgiuafigudfyugudfguifua<br>
          gfiud<br>
          jsdfhs8fse
        </p>
      </div>

      <div class="fairy-card reveal">
        <div class="fairy-frame">
          <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="memory">
          <div class="heart-layer"></div>
        </div>
        <p class="fairy-text">
          abcdfgiuafigudfyugudfguifua<br>
          gfiud<br>
          jsdfhs8fse
        </p>
      </div>

      <div class="fairy-card reveal">
        <div class="fairy-frame">
          <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="memory">
          <div class="heart-layer"></div>
        </div>
        <p class="fairy-text">
          abcdfgiuafigudfyugudfguifua<br>
          gfiud<br>
          jsdfhs8fse
        </p>
      </div>

    </div>
  </section>

  <script>
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll(".reveal");

  const observer = new IntersectionObserver(entries => {
    entries.forEach(entry => {
      if (entry.isIntersecting) {
        entry.target.classList.add("show");

        const frame = entry.target.querySelector(".fairy-frame");

        if (!frame.dataset.started) {
          frame.dataset.started = "true";

          const sparkleLayer = document.createElement("div");
          sparkleLayer.className = "sparkle-layer";
          frame.appendChild(sparkleLayer);

          startFairyEffects(
            entry.target.querySelector(".heart-layer"),
            sparkleLayer
          );
        }
      }
    });
  }, { threshold: 0.4 });

  cards.forEach(card => observer.observe(card));

  function startFairyEffects(heartLayer, sparkleLayer) {

    /* ‚ù§Ô∏è CONTINUOUS HEART BUBBLES */
    setInterval(() => {
      const heart = document.createElement("div");
      heart.className = "heart";
      heart.innerHTML = Math.random() > 0.5 ? "‚ù§Ô∏è" : "üíó";
      heart.style.left = Math.random() * 90 + "%";
      heart.style.fontSize = (14 + Math.random() * 18) + "px";
      heartLayer.appendChild(heart);

      setTimeout(() => heart.remove(), 4000);
    }, 600); // controls heart frequency

    /* ‚ú® CONTINUOUS SPARKLES */
    setInterval(() => {
      const sparkle = document.createElement("div");
      sparkle.className = "sparkle";
      sparkle.style.left = Math.random() * 100 + "%";
      sparkle.style.bottom = Math.random() * 30 + "px";
      sparkleLayer.appendChild(sparkle);

      setTimeout(() => sparkle.remove(), 5000);
    }, 900);

    /* üî• FAIRY FIRE FLIES */
    setInterval(() => {
      const fire = document.createElement("div");
      fire.className = "fire";
      fire.style.left = Math.random() * 100 + "%";
      fire.style.bottom = "0px";
      sparkleLayer.appendChild(fire);

      setTimeout(() => fire.remove(), 3000);
    }, 1200);
  }
</script>


</body>
</html>

      box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
      position: relative;
      z-index: 2;
    }

    .hero-container h1 {
      font-size: 2.5rem;
      color: #7a1f1f;
      min-height: 3.5rem;
    }

    .hero-button {
      margin-top: 2rem;
      padding: 0.7rem 1.6rem;
      font-size: 1rem;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 12px;
      background: #ff9db5;
      color: #7a1f1f;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-family: inherit;
      transition: transform 0.2s;
    }

    /* --- PAGE 2: FAIRY SECTION (Peach) --- */
    .fairy-section {
      min-height: 100vh;
      padding: 6rem 2rem;
      text-align: center;
      background: #fff4ec;
    }

    .fairy-title {
      font-size: 2.6rem;
      margin-bottom: 4rem;
      color: #7a1f1f;
      font-family: cursive;
    }

    .fairy-grid {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
      gap: 4rem;
      max-width: 1100px;
      margin: auto;
    }

    .fairy-card {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(70px) scale(0.95);
      transition: all 1.2s ease;
    }

    .fairy-card.show {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
    }

    .fairy-frame {
      position: relative;
      padding: 16px;
      border-radius: 26px;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd1e8, #ffe6b3);
      box-shadow: 0 0 45px rgba(255, 105, 180, 0.4);
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .fairy-frame::before {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      inset: -25px;
      background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,182,193,0.6), transparent 70%);
      animation: auraPulse 4s infinite alternate;
      z-index: 0;
    }

    @keyframes auraPulse {
      from { opacity: 0.4; }
      to { opacity: 0.9; }
    }

    .fairy-frame img {
      width: 100%;
      height: 300px;
      object-fit: cover;
      border-radius: 18px;
      position: relative;
      z-index: 2;
    }

    .heart-layer, .sparkle-layer {
      position: absolute;
      inset: 0;
      pointer-events: none;
      z-index: 1;
    }

    .fairy-text {
      margin-top: 1.2rem;
      font-size: 0.85rem;
      line-height: 1.4;
      color: #000;
    }

    /* Fairy Particles */
    .heart {
      position: absolute;
      bottom: -20px;
      animation: floatHeart 4s ease forwards;
      opacity: 0.9;
    }
    @keyframes floatHeart {
      0% { transform: translateY(0) scale(0.6); opacity: 1; }
      100% { transform: translateY(-180px) scale(1.5); opacity: 0; }
    }

    .sparkle {
      position: absolute;
      width: 7px; height: 7px;
      border-radius: 50%;
      background: pink;
      box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(255,182,193,0.9);
      animation: sparkleFloat 5s linear forwards;
    }
    @keyframes sparkleFloat {
      from { transform: translateY(40px) scale(0.5); opacity: 1; }
      to { transform: translateY(-160px) scale(1.3); opacity: 0; }
    }

    .fire {
      position: absolute;
      width: 12px; height: 12px;
      background: radial-gradient(circle, #ff9a9e, transparent);
      border-radius: 50%;
      animation: fireFly 3s ease-out forwards;
    }
    @keyframes fireFly {
      from { transform: translateY(30px) scale(0.3); opacity: 1; }
      to { transform: translateY(-120px) scale(1.5); opacity: 0; }
    }

    /* --- PAGE 3: LETTER SECTION (Blue) --- */
    .letter-section {
      height: 100vh;
      background-color: #a7c7f9;
      font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', cursive, sans-serif;
      position: relative;
      overflow: hidden;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column; /* Stacks button and letter vertically */
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      gap: 20px; /* Space between the button and the letter */
    }

    .open-btn {
      z-index: 100;
      background-color: #ff91b4;
      border: none;
      padding: 16px 32px;
      border-radius: 12px;
      font-weight: bold;
      cursor: pointer;
      transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.2s;
    }

    .open-btn:active {
      transform: scale(0.95);
    }

    .letter {
      background-color: #ffcbb3;
      padding: 25px 30px;
      border-radius: 15px;
      width: 320px;
      font-size: 16px;
      text-align: center;
      box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(20px);
      transition: opacity 0.6s ease, transform 0.6s ease;
      z-index: 50;
      pointer-events: none;
    }

    .letter.show {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0);
      pointer-events: auto;
    }

    .floating-heart-p3 {
      position: absolute;
      width: 20px;
      height: 20px;
      background-color: #ff6f8a;
      transform: rotate(-45deg);
      animation: floatP3 6s linear infinite;
      border-radius: 50%;
      opacity: 0.8;
    }
    .floating-heart-p3::before, .floating-heart-p3::after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      width: 20px; height: 20px;
      background-color: #ff6f8a;
      border-radius: 50%;
    }
    .floating-heart-p3::before { top: -10px; left: 0; }
    .floating-heart-p3::after { left: 10px; top: 0; }

    @keyframes floatP3 {
      0% { transform: translate(0,0) rotate(-45deg); opacity: 0.8; }
      50% { transform: translate(calc(var(--x) * 1px), -100px) rotate(-45deg); opacity: 1; }
      100% { transform: translate(calc(var(--x) * 2px), -200px) rotate(-45deg); opacity: 0; }
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>

  <section class="hero-section">
    <div class="bg-heart-p1" style="left: 5%; animation-delay: 0s;">‚ô•</div>
    <div class="bg-heart-p1" style="left: 25%; animation-delay: 2s;">‚ô°</div>
    <div class="bg-heart-p1" style="left: 50%; animation-delay: 4s;">‚ô•</div>
    <div class="bg-heart-p1" style="left: 75%; animation-delay: 1s;">‚ô°</div>
    <div class="bg-heart-p1" style="left: 90%; animation-delay: 3s;">‚ô•</div>

    <div class="hero-container">
      <h1 id="typewriter-text"></h1>
      <button class="hero-button" onclick="startTyping()"> from shruvii!</button>
    </div>
  </section>

  <section class="fairy-section" id="fairy">
    <h2 class="fairy-title">Little moments for you üíó</h2>
    <div class="fairy-grid">
      <div class="fairy-card reveal">
        <div class="fairy-frame">
          <img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRXaFp4t03rNkv1HRS1sxApf_-dirzMuSUM1Q&s" alt="memory">
          <div class="heart-layer"></div>
        </div>
        <p class="fairy-text">abcdfgiuafigudfyugudfguifua<br>gfiud<br>jsdfhs8fse</p>
      </div>

      <div class="fairy-card reveal">
        <div class="fairy-frame">
          <img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRXaFp4t03rNkv1HRS1sxApf_-dirzMuSUM1Q&s" alt="memory">
          <div class="heart-layer"></div>
        </div>
        <p class="fairy-text">abcdfgiuafigudfyugudfguifua<br>gfiud<br>jsdfhs8fse</p>
      </div>

      <div class="fairy-card reveal">
        <div class="fairy-frame">
          <img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRXaFp4t03rNkv1HRS1sxApf_-dirzMuSUM1Q&s" alt="memory">
          <div class="heart-layer"></div>
        </div>
        <p class="fairy-text">abcdfgiuafigudfyugudfguifua<br>gfiud<br>jsdfhs8fse</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </section>

  <section class="letter-section">
    <button class="open-btn" id="openBtn">open me</button>
    
    <div class="letter" id="letter">
      <p>Hey friend! Just wanted to send you a little love and a reminder that you‚Äôre awesome. Keep shining bright and never stop being you! üíñ</p>
    </div>

    <div class="floating-heart-p3" style="left: 10%; top: 90%; animation-delay: 0s; --x: 20;"></div>
    <div class="floating-heart-p3" style="left: 80%; top: 95%; animation-delay: 1s; --x: -30;"></div>
    <div class="floating-heart-p3" style="left: 50%; top: 85%; animation-delay: 2s; --x: 15;"></div>
    <div class="floating-heart-p3" style="left: 30%; top: 90%; animation-delay: 0.5s; --x: -20;"></div>
    <div class="floating-heart-p3" style="left: 70%; top: 92%; animation-delay: 1.5s; --x: 25;"></div>

    <audio id="bgMusic" src="perfect.mp3" preload="auto"></audio>
  </section>

  <script>
    /* TYPEWRITER SCRIPT */
    const message = "I love you so much ";
    let typeIndex = 0;
    let typingStarted = false;
    function startTyping() {
      if (typingStarted) return;
      typingStarted = true;
      typeWriter();
    }
    function typeWriter() {
      if (typeIndex < message.length) {
        document.getElementById("typewriter-text").textContent += message.charAt(typeIndex);
        typeIndex++;
        setTimeout(typeWriter, 120);
      }
    }

    /* FAIRY OBSERVER SCRIPT */
    const cards = document.querySelectorAll(".reveal");
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(entries => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
          entry.target.classList.add("show");
          const frame = entry.target.querySelector(".fairy-frame");
          if (!frame.dataset.started) {
            frame.dataset.started = "true";
            const sparkleLayer = document.createElement("div");
            sparkleLayer.className = "sparkle-layer";
            frame.appendChild(sparkleLayer);
            startFairyEffects(entry.target.querySelector(".heart-layer"), sparkleLayer);
          }
        }
      });
    }, { threshold: 0.4 });
    cards.forEach(card => observer.observe(card));

    function startFairyEffects(heartLayer, sparkleLayer) {
      setInterval(() => {
        const h = document.createElement("div"); h.className = "heart";
        h.innerHTML = Math.random() > 0.5 ? "‚ù§Ô∏è" : "üíó";
        h.style.left = Math.random() * 90 + "%";
        h.style.fontSize = (14 + Math.random() * 18) + "px";
        heartLayer.appendChild(h); setTimeout(() => h.remove(), 4000);
      }, 600);
      setInterval(() => {
        const s = document.createElement("div"); s.className = "sparkle";
        s.style.left = Math.random() * 100 + "%"; s.style.bottom = Math.random() * 30 + "px";
        sparkleLayer.appendChild(s); setTimeout(() => s.remove(), 5000);
      }, 900);
      setInterval(() => {
        const f = document.createElement("div"); f.className = "fire";
        f.style.left = Math.random() * 100 + "%"; f.style.bottom = "0px";
        sparkleLayer.appendChild(f); setTimeout(() => f.remove(), 3000);
      }, 1200);
    }

    /* LETTER SCRIPT */
    const openBtn = document.getElementById('openBtn');
    const letter = document.getElementById('letter');
    const bgMusic = document.getElementById('bgMusic');
    openBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
      letter.classList.toggle('show');
      if (letter.classList.contains('show')) {
        bgMusic.play().catch(() => {
            console.log("Music couldn't play automatically; needs user interaction.");
        });
        openBtn.textContent = "close me";
      } else {
        bgMusic.pause();
        bgMusic.currentTime = 0;
        openBtn.textContent = "open me";
      }
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>
